headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) jumped 2.8% in the morning session after Citigroup raised its price target on the stock.

headline: The Nasdaq Hit a Fresh Record. The AI Trade Is Back On.
summary: The Nasdaq Composite hit its highest level on record and was on track for a fresh closing high on a mixed Monday for the broader market.  The S&P 500 was up 0.4%, but only because of contributions from Broadcom, Lam Research, Palantir Technologies, Nvidia, among other AI-linked stocks; roughly 318 stocks in the index were trading down on the day.  The Dow was up 52 points, or 0.1%, after bouncing between small gains and losses.

The Dow was up 52 points, or 0.1%, after bouncing between small gains and losses.

headline: Did Lam Research's (LRCX) Dividend Boost Offset Analyst Worries About Growth Pressures?
summary: Lam Research Corporation recently announced a US$0.03 increase in its quarterly dividend, raising it to US$0.26 per share, following Board approval, with dividends payable on October 15, 2025 to shareholders of record as of September 24, 2025. This increase comes shortly after analysts voiced concerns over growth potential tied to tightened U.S. export controls to China and a softer outlook in the NAND memory market. We'll explore how the combination of a dividend hike and analyst downgrades...

headline: 3 Cash-Heavy Stocks to Keep an Eye On
summary: Companies with more cash than debt often have stronger financial flexibility, making them attractive in uncertain markets. Without interest payments being less of a worry, these businesses can invest more in growth, innovation, or buybacks and dividends.

raw.headline: 3 Cash-Heavy Stocks to Keep an Eye On
